verbs.description: [ARG0: The concept of American exceptionalism] [V: pretends] [ARG1: to be the idea that America is unique and different in history] ; what it really means is that Americans tend to think that the rules and standards they demand of others does not apply to them . In that same vein , it ’s time to introduce the concept of Trumpian exceptionalism , …
